column4: hello. do releases of new open sofware become available every 6 months?
a new OS comes out every six months, doesn't necessarioly mean all the software is new, but usually at least some of it is
i have heard that if a new version of lets say a math sofware comes availabe i cant use it, until 6 months have passed
i dont know why that would be, you can use it as long as you have it installed
